# Simulation

```{r echo = FALSE}
sir = (flexmodel(
  params = c(beta = 0.1, gamma = 0.01, N = 100),
  state = c(S = 99, I = 1, R = 0),
  start_date = "2020-03-11",
  end_date = "2020-12-01",
  do_make_state = FALSE
)
  %>% add_rate("S", "I", ~ (I) * (beta) * (1/N))
  %>% add_rate("I", "R", ~ (gamma))
  %>% add_outflow
)
```
